product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Rosecityteacher
content: This product is simply amazing. After a rebate from Energy Trust, it was even cheaper than purchase price! (check locally for rebates and save your receipt) I can now set my furnace to turn on when I am on the way home via Google, use voice control via Google, turn the fan on from the couch, and much more. The one tricky feature is Auto-Away - it will still run your program even if you are not there. I realized this early on, and all you need to do is set Away from your phone or thermostat and it will stay off. I have saved a bunch on natural gas, electricity, and energy not thinking about if I left it on or not, or getting out of bed on the weekends to warm the house up. This item is for everyone, a must buy!
title: Saving Energy, Time, and Money

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Creedence
content:
I have had a couple Nest thermostats in my house for about 3 years. They are fairly easy to use and quite intuitive, especially when paired with the mobile app. I had one of my 2nd generations thermostats develop some sort of problem (began to heat up, couldn't detect temperature, turned on the heat instead of the A/C--a general meltdown) so I bought the 3rd Generation as a replacement. I agree with most online reviews that say that gen 3 is an incremental improvement--mostly cosmetic--and generally not at all worth an upgrade from gen 2. Still, this version is more visible from a distance if that's something you care about.
The "works with Nest" compatibility family is a neat thing, and I do use that as a pretty big part of the connected "smart" home I've put together. However it's not a substitute for a dedicated home controller like SmartThings or (my choice) Homeseer. Nest does worth with those just fine. I've never tried Ecobee or the other competitors, but the Nest product line is a solid choice and certainly has an aesthetic appeal compared to a more traditional thermostat.
title: Good product, don't bother upgrading from v2

title: Love my thermostat

The a/c tech who came out to look at the a/c system said that I had installed the thermostat properly. I had no problem with the installation. I just read the installation instructions that came with the thermostat and I also watched a YouTube video that Nest had which showed how to install the thermostat.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: CraigN
content:
I want to preface this review with I absolutely love my Nest, but it absolutely does have some flaws that prevent me from giving it a perfect score.

First, for the positives - it does a great job of controlling my home AC - it reliably figures out when I am away, it learned my weekend and temperature habits fairly quickly, and the quick-look when you walk by in front of it works fantastically. It has a great "Heat & Cool" setting for days that start out warm but get cold in the evening, or vice versa, or you can leave it on heat or cool individually.

Unfortunately it has some quirks - While it reliably figures out when I am away, it has a tougher time figuring out when I am home. I have spent hours out for a day and come home, and it stayed on it's "Away" function even after an hour of being in the house. 

Granted, both the app and the device get regular updates, and lately this quirk has happened less often, it was worth mentioning.

I absolutely love the product despite this and would recommend it to anyone looking to add a well connected and easy-to-setup smart thermostat to their home.
title: Excellent Smart Thermostat

So, I took that one back and went with the Nest thermostat and it was easy to set up and work. I love it!!

author: DCUnit711
content: It works as advertised. My favorite feature is it automatically changing to Away mode when we're all out of the house. No point in heating an empty home! I also like that I can see our usage history to see what days we use the most energy, though I wish it would let me look at a longer history than just one week. It doesn't yet work with Apple Homekit, so if you are looking to control your Nest with Siri, keep waiting. Other than that, a great buy.

I asked my father in-law who had the Nest 2nd Generation for information and he had nothing negative to say about it so I was sold. product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Spot28
content: Roughly 10 years ago I put in a very advanced Honeywell system and Steam Humidification system. When Nest came out, i was very enthusiastic, but then discovered that it couldn't control my humidifier. So I have been waiting. With the recent round of rebates I decided to try - and yes indeed it does control my Humidifier. But now it is wait and see. I can't specify an actual percentage for the humidity on the granularity that I previously could. I don't see an option for Frost control - where it will adjust humidification based on outside temperature. The previous system also had three sensors in the house, whereas the Nest relies on itself and its Cloud data. I like the integration with my other devices and trust that it is using the data from all 9 Nest Smoke Detectors to really confirm when we are home and when we are out - but time will tell. Hoping.
title: So far so good

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: JayBee
content: Long story short, the features and functionality of this device can be good to great.  However, make sure your system and thermostat connection point has and supports a common wire.  Despite Google/Nest's insistence that you do not need one in my experience and in that of many others you really do.  Without a common power your thermostat under heavy load will not pull enough power off your system.  As a result it will possibly (likely) cause your HVAC system to short cycle.  There are various remedies available to alleviate this issue, but for people who do not have a common wire and or have a system where heat and A/C are spliced together, this can be more trouble than its worth and or require an HVAC specialist to rewire your system.
title: Make Sure You Have a Common Wire

author: Ewd3600
content: Purchased a ecobee 4, returned it. I then purchased a Nest 3rd generation. The Nest is a true Learning smart thermostat. The first week or so it learned how I set my home. By the end of the first week I never needed to schedule or set a temp. It automatically scheduled times for me. So it is a smart Thermostat vs the ecobee which is a programmable thermostat with Alexa. Nest also can be controlled with Alexa. All in all. You will be happy with the nest.
title: Best smart thermostat on the market

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Darude
content: I was skeptical when I purchased this.... One month in, I'd buy more if I had that many thermostats! This has made my temperature control in my house easy! It took 15 min to install for the first one, then the second one (I have two zones) took less than 5 min. I know know all of my usage, can control the temp from my phone, and I have a quick view of the time, weather outside, and humidity inside my house without even thinking about it. If you haven't purchased one of these, do it now. It's groundbreaking for your home.
title: Worth It!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Eliot
content: Decided to return this since it is expensive and I am not sure the learning feature is worth it.
title: expensive; maybe not worth it

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: deanhv
content: I have purchased three (3) of these for my home. All them were easy to install. There are not many instructions included in the box; however the instructions on line made up for that. Truth be told for general installation directions are not needed; however if you are wanting to set everything up the online instructions help. We have had these installed for about 3 months now and we have seen our bill reduced by about 15-20% of course the dog-days of Texas summer are not yet upon us.
title: Nest Thermo

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Rexman71
content: I already had a Nest 2nd Generation downstairs and when it was time to upgrade the 17 year old Trane Weathertron thermostat, I chose Nest for its compatibility with my gas backed up heat pump. The ability to quickly schedule the temps on the smartphone app or see what was going on with my system definitely factored in my decision. Nest, easy to use and easy to learn.
title: Intuitive and convenient

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Frails
content: The set up was easy. The wireless features are nice.
title: Awsome

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: VCLONG
content: It was clear after the first few days that the Nest was keeping track of my temperature preferences and applying them automatically. The "learning" feature claim is true, as is the potential to save money on heating/cooling throughout the year. I also love the summaries provided on how long heating/cooling was used throughout the day. I should add that I put this in a new home and did not have WIFI set up for the first few weeks. Not a problem - the Nest did not require WIFI to provide all the features I noted above. Once you get WIFI and load the app - even more impressive! The only reason I did not give this a full 5 stars is that the user manual was a little light on how to change the settings as the Nest was learning and applying changes. This could be because I did not have the app loaded at the time I started using Nest - not sure.
title: Smart features are impressive!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: mikejag
content: We bought the Nest to make it easier to manage our home heating & cooling and to monitor while away from home. The setup was a breeze (easiest thermostat I've installed so far!). The system takes a few days to "learn" your preferred settings, but once it does you barely have to touch it. While the base price is a bit expensive, these constantly go on sale, so worth waiting & picking up then.
title: Easy to Setup and Easy to Use

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: CMoney6788
content: Very easy to use. It learns by itself, and the daily report out of energy savings through the app is top notch! It also helps me out when I forget to set it to "away" mode.
title: Great thermostat for any level of knowledge

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Focuznik
content: I think it’s the best thermostat one can get. Simple as that.
title: Should’ve bought it sooner

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: ph16
content: I moved from a programmable thermostat that never got programmed to this smart thermostat that is already learning to save energy while we are away from home. I don't know how many months it will take, but I expect it to pay for itself in electricity savings, especially in hot, hot So. Fla.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: randygoblue
content: Yes, this is an expensive little gadget, but if you're anything like me, this thing will pay for itself in a matter of months. I constantly forget to turn down (winter) or turn up (summer) my thermostat before I leave the house. This is no longer an issue for me because I can do it from anywhere with the phone app. Also, don't forget, that the potential rebates from your electric company and natural gas provider can be as high as $150 which makes this an even better value for your money!!!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Averagecustomer
content: Excellent product, would recommend this highly to everyone. A bit pricey but worth it

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: PraiseHim
content: Easy setup and installation. It walks you through everything.
title: Easy to use

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: RGDYI
content:
What a great investment. Yes it's investment because my usage and energy consumption has really been optimized after installing two of these. Besides controlling temperature automatically based on my setting patterns fo few days, it also senses if I am at home or away and accordingly put the system in echo mode to save electricity/ gas. We are very impressed with the product. Did I mention we could now adjust temperature remotely through the phone even if we like to override settings.
?☺️✌️
title: Best automation product of the year

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: rathman22
content: works perfectly. Haven’t had any issues sense purchase.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Adik
content: Nest Thermostat is my buddy. He looks our for me. He makes sure my HVAC system runs in ECO mode to save me money when I'm not home, so I can spend more money on other gadgets. Not sure my cat likes it but thats what happens when you don't have thumbs to operate a smartphone. I win. My wallet wins. Everybody wins. I periodically check the home temp on my iphone app just to make sure the house is not on fire. I also recommend the Nest Protect. Awesome!
title: Nest my buddy

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: JackD
content: It's a good product of which I had for almost 2 years. The downside to this product is that if it can't locate an internet signal, it will drain the battery significantly and the only remedy is to exchange the entire nest system. Thankfully, I had paid for the additional two year warranty so the exchange was no problem but it's definitely a flaw in the Nest as they don't update properly.
title: Handy product!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: stylez619
content:
I was blown away with how easy installation was. 5 or 6 color coded wires and boom, done. Took less than 20 minutes.

Connectivity and set-up was breeze, and also intuitive. Control via the mobile app or from a Smart Hub Assistant is flawless and works every time. 

The additional rebates from your utility provider is just the icing on the cake. There's really no reason not to get one now.
title: Easy, efficient, and convenient

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: SmartHomeDumbGuy
content: Let me guess you're debating between the Ecobee and Nest? I went Nest and I'm a complete Apple geek (iPhone, Apple TV Apple Watch. MBP and iMac). The Nest thermostat is the crutch and most critical part where many other products integrate with. The Nest has provided us ease of mind by controlling the temperature for our apartment when our pet bulldog is at home. The entire Nest ecosystem works brilliantly together so if you plan on investing into multiple smart home devices - this is the way to go.
title: Believe the hype

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: 432GR
content: If you are looking for an energy saver, this thermostat will help you get there. I tried the Ecobee but had better luck with the Nest. Glad I got to try them both before fully committing. The Nest has brought my power bill down about 12% and it pays for itself in 8 months for me!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: HarleyChick

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Jay1952

I love the look of the thermostat on the wall, the digital display, the programmable features and especially the ability to monitor and control the heat and a/c in my home when I'm not home. It definitely has all the bells and whistle you'll ever need and it's everything as promised by the manufacturer.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: G4Family
content: Great product with a lot of convenience. Would  absolutely recommend to anyone looking for a smart thermostat.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Mrhispeed

If it doesn’t turn on right away it just needs to charge the battery up for about 5 minutes...don’t panic. Great device definelty recommend.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Satish
content: After hesitating to fork over the price tag for a nest, I took the dive. As a skeptical (on the ROÍ) buyer, I feel that I have recouped my investment in record time. product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

For instance, if you start turning down the AC at night for a few nights but suddenly stop doing it, it will continue that learned behavior even after many nights of readjusting it over and over again.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: FourMs

The diagram pointed out exactly where the issue was. Also I have noticed that the Nest is far more efficient that my prior one, our air is not working as hard as before and the energy bill has decreased.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Guil0608092

Its a great thermostat with many options which helps controlling it. Another great thing is having the app which you can control it from anywhere. 

I do recommend the sensors they will help because one part of the house maybe cold and others hot.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

It provides proper heating and cooling by assessing our usage and regulating on its own. Talk about a smart product... this one is brillant and a must have.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: yoda

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: rlocsin
content: The Nest Thermostat 3rd Generation was easy to install. I like the self learning feature as well as the ability to control the thermostat with your cell phone through the Nest App. The Away feature was also great at saving energy when you are away. It can automatically detect via cell phone or presence of motion around the thermostat but I did not use this feature. I manually controlled the Away feature. In the auto detect mode, if you are sleeping in the room, it mistakenly senses that there is nobody in the house.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Corbin

With with kids in the house for the summer it made sense to have a thermostat that knows when someone is home instead of one that is only programmed to our work schedule, which changes weekly. The old unit didn't really work for us anymore.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: James
content: At first I wasn't sure if I really wanted to spend this much money on a smart thermostat, but I've wanted one for a while so I decided to pull the trigger. It was a breeze to install, easy to use and I haven't had a single issue with it. I should have bought one a long time ago.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: scalefactor
content:
The unit was easy to connect and even easier to use. I had it connected and set up in under 10 minutes. 

We love being able to control the temperature from any location in or out of the house; and it's especially pleasing to be able to access the Nest on a cold, rainy evening, while stuck in traffic and return home to the perfect temperature. 

The design is also so minimal it fits beautifully into any decor, visible without being an eyesore. We use ours with a 75-year old radiant heating system and plan to purchase another for use with our new A/C system in the spring.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: DirkDiggler
content: I bought the Nest thermostat because it was recommended. I am liking how the Nest goes to Eco mode when I’m away which saves me money. I am waiting to see the long term results for this item.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: DCMD

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

UPDATE THE DESCRIPTION!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Foofighter
content: It’s a little bit complicated at first, but when you get the hang of it, it’s a breeze to operate it. The  Nest is a great energy saver. It learns when you are home & away.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Mar0724

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: zgnsi

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Pook16
content: I have been very pleased with this thermostat overall. It was easy to install and pretty easy to get set up as well. They even have a very good process for verifying if this will work with your existing system. I took a picture of my wires and everything from my existing thermostat and sent it to Nest. I received a response within the next business day and they even had personalized instructions for me on how and where to connect everything (as well as confirming that it was compatible). Well made product!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Murali
content:
I usually don't do house work and generally i get it done from outside. But this installation was very easy. There was one wire additional in my previous thermostat and i connected it wrong at first (it was not there in NEST video). Initially the NEST was cooling although it says heating. I called NEST CSR and they asked me to reconnect this additional wire different location. That person was extremely helpful and it got fixed.

All the set-up was easy as well and the App works great. So far it is working as expected and am able to control from outside.
title: Excellent and intuitive!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Jay241
content:
I thought it was going to be somewhat difficult to install the thermostat but it was very easy to do. The only concern was the wires from the old thermostat not knowing 100% were they will be connected. However, you can call the representative and send them a picture of your current setting (before removing the wires from the old one) and the person at the other end will tell you exactly where they go.

The only reason I give it 4 stars is due to the "Away mode", 2 out of 10 times works and I think it is a very important feature if you want to save on electric bills.
title: Works great.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Will
content: I have a 3 zone heating unit and I have a nest thermostat for each zone. Being able to control it from anywhere and learn my preferences made this a must for all houses.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

content: I bought this for my parents. They aren’t very tech savvy, but learned how it works quickly. So far, they love the nest! It was one of the hotter summer days in MN and they really appreciated that the AC was working before they arrived.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: SYsmartHome
content:

Also important is the “learning” feature so the AC is not running like crazy when no one is home. 
Also connects through app on phone and can be adjusted from anywhere.

it took a long time before I decide to purchase this nest .I glad I choose this over e nest and ecobee. after watching on line install It fairly not hard to install . The feature is cool on dial and push the nest outside ring for heat or fan.

I love to wake up and tell alexa to turn the AC off so I don't freeze when coming out of shower! and then, Alexa, turn the AC on again!

I also added it to Alexa's skills, so I can easily control it through the voice commands. I really like how it will tell you when your furnace needs service, like filter changes. I also purchased the NEST CO2/Smoke alarm and installed it at the same time.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: FASTEDDIE

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: SeanK
content: This thermostat was very easy to install. The one feature it has over some of the other "smart" thermostats is it keeps track of how much time the Heater/AC has been on each day. Also let's you lock in temperature and not allow others to change without a password.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Nana
content: Product comes with easy to follow instructions and works well.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Walker

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: SonyExtraBass
content: No muss no fuss this thing works great!  I set it and forget it but I still can control it with my app and it integrates with all my Nest and Google options!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Isufan
content: Easy to install. I use the manual scheduling feature which allows numerous settings within a day/ week, providing increased comfort while saving energy. The eco and home away features, and the ability to change settings remotely via cell phone have been critical. I was so impressed i bought one as a gift for my daughter. Don't forget to check your utility provider or state for rebates.
title: Great purchase!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Recman
content:
This thermostat is unlike any I have had in that it can take the weather into account so it will try to reach setpoint by my personal schedule or learned schedule. Because I have a Radiant heat source it naturally takes a log time to get to setpoint which isn't the thermostat's fault. But it will take the heat momentum into its learning calculations in order to turn the heat off even if it's below the setpoint because of expecting it to naturally get warmer after my gas turns off. Really cool thermostat. 

I only had an issue of not charging it before I set it on the wall (which I recommend to do for 45 minutes) and it never quite got enough charge and therefore turned its wifi radio off. I called nest support and they helped me understand that it could have just sat too long at Best Buy waiting to be purchased and lost some charge.
title: Good Heat Energy Saver

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: SanDisk
content: Easy set up comes with everything you need to install it, app works well and is user friendly
title: Easy set up

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: connieg
content: I have had this installed for about 5 months now and I am not the best at new technology, so learning it is a bit of challenge, but I absolutely love it so far. I think i will love it more as I learn more about it.
title: love love love it

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

With the new build home we were told that our thermostat was smart - well... it pales in comparison with Nest - ever since the switch we saved more then 30% of our energy bill (both electric and gas combined). This is a must have accessory in every home in my opinion.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: UptownGirl

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: dpmill

Ecobees servers were unavailable at times, and response to call for heat or cool took minutes vs sub-1 second response time from the Nest. Save yourself some aggravation, and purchase the Nest.
title: If considering, stop and just buy it.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: nmyota
content: We just moved to a new home and had to buy these.  We had 2 in our last house and the ease of set up, the functionality and of course the energy savings make this unit a no-brainer.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: NEMA
content: Great way to take control of your home thermostat.  Learns when we are away and saves us energy.  Great mobile app and controls.  Super easy installation, everything needed is in the box!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: awan
content: Excellent service, very pleased with purchase, good high quality product.
title: Excellent thermostat

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: JJJY
content: Well there's thermostat as find the check on my smartphone to see what's going on at home were traveling
title: Great nest

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: mikeh
content: I bought the Nest smart thermostat and love it already. Setup was pretty easy, and now were just training it. But it is already intuitively making adjustments at night and in the morning based on our schedule. I am able to adjust it from my phone when I'm leaving work. Right now we have it hooked up to the our Google Home as well, so I can adjust it by telling google, without getting up. Nice feature. Waiting to see if and how the bills are actually affected though.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: JohnW
content: After reviewing multiple smart thermostats we decided to get the nest. We had an issue during the installation setup so we called customer service. Well, the lady found the issue very quickly and stayed on the phone until it was fixed. Awesome service

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: argamando
content: I've read about the Nest Thermostat for years, and finally made the investment. It's as awesome as you think it would be. Installation was super simple, especially for someone not as familiar with this type of thing. It works perfectly and the app that goes with it is just as simple. You can change the thermostat settings from the device itself, the Nest app, or with smart home devices such as HomeKit on iOS or an Amazon Echo. If you've been on the fence about purchasing a Nest, just go for it. You won't be sorry.
title: Awesome

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Beacher
content: Easy to install, and operate. Thermostat started learning our habits and needs in the first few days. I am guessing it will pay for itself before the end of the winter. This was an excellent decision to replace our old thermostats with smart technology.
title: Smart

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: fish
content: This is 3rd one we have installed in our house for a 3 zone system. Easy to install. Works with our boiler. Enjoy the remote capability for scheduling and adjusting heat for when we are away and just before we arrive
title: Easy to install

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: wkstaley
content: We decided to try the Nest after using a programmable thermostat for over 20 years. The great thing about the Nest versus a regular programmable thermostat is that you are not stuck with a weekly schedule. As I work part time it has learned my schedule and will turn down when I leave for work, different days of the week. The programmable wouldn't do that, I had to turn it down and then back up. You can also set the Nest using your smart phone. If we are gone for the day we can have the house warm by the time we get there. Loving it!!!
title: Great product!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Kestryk
content:
This is a great addition to any 'connected home'. I found it very easy to install and setup for first time use. It is extremely easy to use and looks great on he wall.

Best Feature: the ability to cool down the house or turn on the fan without leaving the bed.

Even if you don't use all the features all the time, it is still well worth the investment.
title: Great device, Easy to Install

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Noelh1995

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Dancinggrandma
content: Local AC company wanted to charge us $240 to install 2 nest. Dont pay anyone do it yourself super easy to install and detup. Still waiting on 1st electric bill. Learnes patterns over a few days. I think it will decrease bill

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Jcheezy
content: I upgraded from gen 2 and this new version is far more sensitive and the new screen is quite viewable from across the room! The ability to pair with a separate thermostat is very helpful to getting the temperature control just right.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Ash85
content: In the market Nest is one the most user friendly smart thermostat available. Easy to install and setup the device. Only downside is even though it suggests no C wire is required, encountered multiple times fan blower breaker tripped. Nest CS were unable to acknowledge that it's the Nest issue, recommended few options to try But I figured out that once thermostat is turned off it will loose power which trips the breaker. Only way to fix it is never turn off the Nest or install C wire with hvac guy support & reclaim with Nest.
title: User friendly thermostat

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Braque
content: This is my second Thermastat and pretty much had to buy it within a week of moving into my new house. The ability to turn it on / off from my phone. Or be notified that something is wrong with my furnace when I’m traveling and instead of coming home to the pipes frozen you can get it fixed . Won’t own a home without it.
title: New House New Thermastat!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: HUHAX
content: This product has eliminated my energy conservation stress! It is so simple to install and program. Now I know that the house thermostat is set to the best level based on occupancy and typical work routines. Bonus is the ability to query it and control it with my voice from my Alexa and Google home speakers!
title: Great Product!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: ShawnH
content: I had a defective one that didn't take the software completely. Nest support was quick and thorough to replace it. Installed the replacement and love it. I am already getting reports on the energy savings being generated by the thermostat learning!!!
title: Great Product

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: mrdjdes
content:
We just had a new heating/air conditioning system installed and thought why not purchase this thermostat with the hopes that it will also save us some money. 
It is very easy to use. Setting up the programs is very simple. The app makes it simple for anyone in the house to adjust. 
We are pleased with it. We wish we had purchased another for our other zone!
title: Love it!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: rheacer
content: I've had a programmable thermostat for over 10 years and when I got it, the savings were obvious but the family had difficulty operating it, this new NEST thermostat solved that problem and more. It's easy to operate but the ability to manipulate it remotely is the biggest benefit. Easy to install and setup, I can't imagine a better option.
title: Everyone should have one

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: pcd550
content: Replaced a first generation ecobee (2011) with this thermostat. It is very easy to install (thanks to miniaturization of electronics - new ecobee has evolved similarly) but best if one connects a common wire to keep the battery charged (instructions not as clear on this). User interface is simpler than ecobee's (e.g., can set a new temp without having to specify for how long) but reports are nowhere near as detailed or useful. Sensors for room occupancy are far too sensitive and commonly indicate someone is home when we are gone for the weekend. Best to shut them off when away. Of course, these are nits and the product is very good, overall!
title: Very good, overall

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Greatmovie
content: I have an older house so it took a little time to install. Lots of features that are easy to access on the app or at home in person.
title: Cool beans!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: tucsonrunner
content: Love the fact I can turn on my A/C on my drive home works great when you want a cool house to come home too
title: Easy peazy

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Nelson
content: I like the ability to control thermostat remotely. But at times I get the message that the nest was offline. So I close and open the app to wake the thermostat (hoping that helps). Sometimes just two or three attempts are good and sometimes more than 5 tries. Overall, it's a good buy. I like the usage history a lot.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

Well cant say enough

saves a lot on your bills

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: azjy
content: Installation was a breeze. Their website has a great tool for matching up the wires you have with where they are supposed to go on the Nest. Once installed, everything just worked. The interface and app are intuitive and easy to use. The only thing I would point out is that the “learning” mode is on by default. That’s not necessarily a problem, but something to be aware of.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Stewart
content: I bought this to replace a broken thermostat in my home. Installation was as easy as matching the wire colors to the correct notches in the brain and took 1-2 minutes to do. The box has EVERYTHING you need to install it, including a screwdriver and template. We plan to get one for upstairs so that I can adjust the temperature after the kids forget to change it in the mornings before school.
title: Super easy to install, great product, VERY happy!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: tberce21

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Jeeper4life
content: The thermostat was a little difficult to get set up.  The instructions are a little confusing.  Once I did get it set up in the app, I have found this a very great addition to our home.  I really love that it learns the patterns of occupancy in the house.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: JOha
content: Worked great with a few glitches from ECO setting until right before warranty ended, Stopped heating and blows cold air. Had it checked by HVAC specialist says it was Nest. Buying an Ecobee not dealing with after warranty blues from Google.
title: Works until warranty

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: SonsRFun
content: My husband bought this and I thought it was a bit pricey for a thermostat. However seeing all the features that it's capable of, I was immediately impressed. I love how it lights up when I walk by at night and we can program via our phone. It also tells you how long it'll take to heat up your house to the desired temp which prevents us from blasting the heater! It looks great on the wall and the rebate program makes it even better!
title: A Must for Smart Homes!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: CaptYossarian
content: Thermostats are basically utilitarian pieces of equipment; nothing too sexy about them. But this little beauty is smart and learns your schedule, automatically turning down heat during the day and then bringing it back up in time dinner. You can control via a smartphone app from anywhere, and you get an automatic monthly summary of your energy usage. I've already noticed a reduction in the amount of time my heat pump is running, and I suspect it will pay for itself within two years. Highly recommended.
title: Excited about a thermostat?

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Adewale
content: Got me self two of these and replaced my ‘dumb’ thermostat. I can control the heating and cooling from anywhere in the world which is a major advantage in itself. With a standard dumb thermostat, you’re limited to schedules and you can’t make real time updates except when you’re back home
title: Speaks for itself

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: BB23
content: We are almost a month into using our Nest thermostat and we love it. It helps to keep energy levels at a minimum all while keeping you comfortable, as well. We have often tried to limit our energy usage; however, would often forget to turn down the thermostat when we left for work or things like that. This does all of that for you. We ran the eco setting for most of the past month while the weather was not yet overly hot and it was very nice.
title: Easy to install and use!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Celljunkie83
content: I have used other brand smart thermostats and this by far is the best. It has eco modes that allow you to set it for when your not home. The app works perfectly with it as well. The best part is the easy installation and set up. Got it up and running in less than 15 minutes.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: MrDang
content: Simple install. Easy use. Aesthetically pleasing. Use this to change out a thermostat that was installed when the house was first built in 1980s. Best minor change to simplify my life.
title: Simple device

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: CoachLi
content: I bought these on the recommendation of my HVAC guy. I travel alot and sometimes I forget to adjust the thermostat before I leave. He was supposed to come back to install the 2 Nest thermostats, but he didn't return my call. I guess it wasn't enough money for him. I decided to try to install them myself and it couldn't have been easier. I took off one star because it sometimes goes offline for no reason when everything else is still connected to the wifi with no problems.
title: Love these thermostats

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Lasalleballer
content: After installing this thermostat, it began learning my desired temperatures throughout different times of the day as I made adjustments. After about a week, I rarely have to touch the thermostat and I always feel comfortable. The HomeAway feature is also great.
title: Great way to make your home more efficient

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Ianps1979
content: I’m so happy with this item , makes my life so much easier
title: Best item I have ever bought

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Ruth
content: I was worried about installing this technology but it was a breeze to complete and looks great. Easy to connect other members of the family to the account so we all have control whenever someone goes away.
title: Love IT!!!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: RCarter
content: The install was super simple and the Nest Customer Service is excellent if you run into any issues. This thermostat has so many options that after a few months i am sure that i am still not taking full advantage of this system. But I love the fact that I can control it through the app away from home and that I don't have to get up to see what the temperature is anymore. I can simply ask my google home to simply lower or raise the temperature from the bed and presto its done. No more getting up in the middle of the night when my wife is creating too much body heat lol.
title: Easy install and working great

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: clevernicknamegoeshere
content: I upgraded to this Nest from a non-programmable thermostat. It was dead simple to install, and the menus are all intuitive enough to use without an owner's manual. I have most of the bells and whistles activated, and I'm starting to see the evidence of what it has "learned". Additionally, my thermostat is located in the warmest part of my home, and the Nest's narrower temperature tolerances keep the living space at a more consistent temperature than my old thermostat.
title: intuitive and effective

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Rich32
content:
Since I bought a new house, I was able to install this with no issue. The set up was easy as long as you know basic technology. 
 Rebate from local energy company was good enough incentive.
title: Great Purchase

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: NerdinDisguise
content: We purchased the nest to help out with the electric bill we are a busy family always on the go it works like a charm we are in and out all day and it definitely helps with the electric bill and also is nice that when you leave it turns itself down or up depending on the weather
title: Amazing

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: nittanyatl
content:
Once installed, the Nest worked great. It's simple / intuitive to operate. It will be a while until I can see how much, if any it impacts energy usage.

Check your electricity provider for rebates/discounts. I could have bought my Nest from my provider with a $100 discount.

In my case, installation was complex even for my ac/heating service company due to the nature of my system which has dual fuel and a steam humidifier. They had to do some significant rewiring and replace a part of the existing system. For some systems, the install can be much simpler such that even a non-mechanically inclined person can easily do it. In my case, professional installation (and an additional part) was needed and cost more than the Nest device.
title: High quality but install can be complex sometimes

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Albert
content: So I purchased the nest a little over a month ago. The install was easy, instructions were easy to follow and I'm not a big handy man when it comes to wiring but nest made it easy. I turned it on and snap, it worked! I was happy. A month later the system started giving me an error message on the thermostat screen. I called nest and they walked me through the troubleshoot. So, they determined I needed a common wire install because my old thermostat ran on batteries and the nest doesn't so it's started having a power sharing issue. The good news is nest will reimburse me for the HVAC tech to come out and install. I haven't received my check yet so that's why I'm rated this product 3 stars. The nest when working is efficient and modern looking. If all goes well I'll look into the nest camera.
title: Been a roller coaster

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: user
content:
Installation was not difficult but here are a few tips for other first time buyers:

I watched a few YouTube videos prior to installation and they were very helpful. 

Find where the main breaker box is and check if labels are clear (and correct). I spent over 20 minutes to find the correct breaker switch since the labels on my breaker were wrong. I had to turn off each one and come back to the thermostat to see if the breaker I just turned off was correct one.

Check the fuel type of your furnace: natural gas, oil, or electric.
Have your home’s WiFi ID and password.

Enjoy.
title: First time smart thermostat buyer

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: arjay67
content:
When the Nest first hit the market I was put off by the price. I was also skeptical if another "internet sensation" would have any longevity. I didn't want to be on the bleeding edge only to be burned if/when the company faltered. 

But Nest has stood the test of time and remained. So when I had some RZ certs to use I combined that savings with the $100.00 rebate from ComEd to feel a lot better about the price.

The Nest has shown to be easy to setup and operate. The instructions were clear, with additional information on their website that is very thorough. They also have installation videos for the more visual learners. They have a network of professional installers available if you really don't want to DIY. But for my situation, I found that the most difficult part of the installation was removing my old thermostat. The instructions are clear and easy to follow, everything is well labeled and the whole job took me about 30 minutes.

It's very nice that Nest includes the additional mounting bracket for those rare installations that would require it. But even better was the trim plate since my old thermostat was a bigger, rectangular model that had been painted around. The trim plate covered it up and made it a professional looking job. While I like and appreciate the inclusion of the trim plate, I would like it more if there were other finish options available. But this is a very minor issue. It just plain looks good on the wall.

I did have one momentary hiccup on the setup. On the first attempt it could not connect to my WIFI. I know the user/pass was corrected, it just took forever and then gave an error. I tried it a second time and it connected right away and has remained active for months. So if at first it doesn't connect, just wait a minute and try it again. 

I have the savings features enabled. So it's set to start cooling down about the time I leave work. But if I have to work late and it doesn't detect anyone home, it will stay in the upper setting until I arrive home. Better still, I can always launch the app on my phone and tell Nest to start the cooling before I leave work. I loved this feature so much about my car, now I have it IN MY HOME!!!
title: Rebates make it a MUST HAVE!

author: K8TM
content:
I'm very happy with my Nest Thermostat. Works well with my Alexa-powered smart home and has already started "learning" about my needs. Turns itself down at night and in the morning when I was feeling cold I walked over to it and before I could touch it it automatically turned on the heat - reading my mind! 

The only downside I have is that there are no good peripherals like sensors to put in different rooms or compatibility with smart vents. I'm very happy with it though it was easy to set up, looks great on the wall and even came with a cover plate to hide the bad paint job that was behind my old thermostat!

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: MnShawn
content: I purchase this unit for my home. I have a 3 zone heating and cooling system in my house. Before opening the box but after buying the Nest I read on the box to verify the unit will work on your system. The box says it will work on over 95% of homes in the US. I guess I must be one of the 5 % it doesnt work on. What was frustrating is that I checked the website and it told me to email technical support to verify it will work in my home. I did that and the customer support department told me that it would work. And for a short period of time it did. Until I realized that my upstairs and downstairs zones no longer worked. So in the end I had to return the device. But for the time I had the Nest it was very cool to run and play with.
title: Verify it works for your system

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

Terrible do not buy these the worst thermostat ever made. Had nothing but trouble

Look at each product made by different companies!
This is a lemon  check other web reviews ! We did not ! BIG MISTAKE ! 
Terrible

On its own !!

3 time a charm 
Called our electrician 
Installed different type 
We lost money  on all ends 
Do not buy ! 
Nest will not help you

Even still, a solid purchase.

I hear this will eventually work its way out because it has a smart setting but it's the only con I'm seeing with this item.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Tushar
content:
Easy to install, look & feel all excellent as compared to our old standard honeywell thermostat. Scheduling & History is one of the favourite features we had been relying on consistently.
Learning helps to get this thermostat adjusted to our schedules. Only negative aspect of this is "Auto Away" feature, in a sense it is good if entire family isn't in the house but sometimes for few hours if no one passes by the thermostat and so it goes in Auto Away. Some enhancement can be of control this feature systematically via auto alerts if Nest app is installed on the phone.

Over-all excellent product, will have to watch for next few months on how its helping to reduce gas bills.
title: Nice Thermostat

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: eslmike
content: Do not try to install this yourself if you have an old home with a four wire furnace line because you can totally screw up your AC. I thought I had mine set corretly and it worked well for about three months when the lack of a common wire on my four wire furnace wiring suddenly caused the capacitor on my blower to fail, leading to a frozen AC and a lot of water in the basement. I am super lucky that caught it before more damage was done and that I have a friend who works in HVAC and could fix my AC and update my furnace wiring, on Memorial Day no less. In the end, it is an ok product but it is not as simple as it seems to install and you could end up seriously damaging some very expensive equipment, so I recommend getting it installed by a pro.
title: Not for DIYers in Old Homes

author: JimD
content: I saw all the great reviews and because I have two homes with Nest thermostats and Nest cameras that installed easily and work great ordered this one.  First of all installation was complicated and tedious.  Directions were minimal and required several email exchanges of wiring diagrams before it would work.  Even though I was on the chat line for what seemed like hours we never did get it connected to the internet.  (my two Nest cameras are both connected to the ap).  The chat line help was patient but at one point asked me to find someone else to help me enter the PW.  I explained I have two homes with the same PW in both homes and on several Nest devices but this one was not connecting.  Finally I surrendered and gave up.  I would have returned it but it is installed and working manually but will not buy another.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: nss60
content: I have two of these devices and the setup is very well done. There are numerous features on this product and I like the fact it works with our NEST cameras. I would like to see an option for a backup battery the owner could add, as we have one device that doesn't get enough trickle charge from the power line and the device shuts down features. Eventually, we have to use a USB cord and power adapter to charge the device, which shuts your system down while the device is unattached. For the price, these should have a better power backup capability.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: arturosjrtx
content: This thermostat is all about the hype. Our home came with a Honewell Wifi Thermostat and over the black friday deals I decided to purchase a Nest Thermostat. I regret it, On the first day of installation Nest had a nationwide network outage that include many customers including ours. If I adjust the thermostat now, it takes a while for it to kick on. I'll be returning this thermostat today and probably just reinstall our Honeywell Wifi or purchasing a new Honeywell color screen. After reading reviews and blogs, I see other users aren't so happy with their Nest's either. I guess its good for some and not so good for others, its all a personal preference. Menus are not easily user friendly if you have anyone staying over to house-sit. You would have to teach them how to use it. It's a no go for me.
title: Too much hype

author: Miak
content:
I have been using the Nest learning thermostat for over 1 month and I have the following pros and cons:
Pros: Works with DropCam and IFTTT to allow automation of video monitoring and voice control of the Nest Thermostat using Amazon Echo.
Cons: I find that the learning did not change once it was set after a week and now if I am using different temps during the day it does not learn anymore.
I would definitely buy this again as it works well and makes my home look cool, 21st century AI techy. I've gotten compliments on it already ;)
title: Definitely Learning Thermostat

author: KTabulous
content:
It works just like advertised. It looks good on the wall too.

It was really easy to install. I did it myself (with no experience) and was able to do it in about 30 minutes. Make sure you use the stickers that come with it to label the wires.

I'm only giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because of the price. It's incredibly expensive for what is ultimately just a wifi enabled programmable thermostat. I haven't noticed and reduction in my electric bill. It's a fun toy if you have extra money, but not a big life changer.
title: Works great!

author: SimGuy
content:
I purchased the thermistat after reading reviews. Installed and thermostat worked for a week. Woke up at 2 in the morning to a chilly house. Furnace was off. Called Nest and spent two hours on the phone with them trouble shooting. I was impressed with how much they helped. The internal battery was dead and the tech determined that it was because my router was conttantly pinging it keeping the radio on. I hadn't seen my router on the list of incomparable devices but he thought it was. We decided to try charging the battery using the USB port for a day and seeing if it started working. I installed an old thermostat in the intermediate. When I tried it a couple days later the battery was still dead. I didn't have time to mess with it so just returned it to Best buy. A couple days later a senior Nest tech called to ask about it. He said my router was comparable and that given the battery wouldn't charge the charging circuit was bad.

I was actually very impressed with the service team. I will probably try another Nest thermostat when I get the time. While working it performed well. I had it connected to our Logitech Harmony system and it worked well together.
title: I got a lemon.

author: UncleBRUCE
content: I bought the nest thermostat and it worked fine and saved me money on my air conditioning bills for a year. Now it is failing. I keeps setting the temperature back to 60 degrees or 70 degrees all by itself. The outside temperature here in Gilbert is about 65 at night and 91 in the daytime. I thought it was supposed to allow the air conditioner to go up to the set 81 degrees when we are not home and set to 76 when we are home. Overnight and random times during the day it does not allow the temperature to go up but goes down 10 to 15 degrees. I am waiting for my next electric bill. I called and they had me clear all the memory setting. That doesn't work. It started doing it again within 12 hours. I must call again and if They dont send me a new unit for free, I will remove it and send it back. Bust buy costomers I reccomend you wait to buy a nest thermostat until this matter is resolved. My electric bill has ........?
title: It failed

author: JoliH
content: Purchased two Nest learning thermostats and so wanted them to work. After 6hours of customer support, my home was deemed incompatible, due to a C wire. Home is less than 2 years old. Fan would not turn off and nest face would not charge. Nest customer service was fantastic. However, i do believe; Nest needs make some minor changes to make the unit more compatible. They offer to reimburse for the cost of a C WIRE install, with a limit of $300. Since i needed two units installed (C wire) the cost was way higher. With the price of the nest, i didnt feel the investment was worth additional costs. Was sadly disappointed and let down. If nest is offering to assist with Cwire install (up to $300), Why not upgrade the product (allow for batteries) and or add an adapter which incorporates the C wire (like ecobee). Nest can do better.
title: Great concept - needs improvements

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: gigi
content:
mostly wanted wifi thermostat to adjust temperature when we are out of town - want to come back to a warm house. So far it takes too long for the temperature to heat up to my comfort setting - I have called customer service and there suggestions haven't changed things. I turned off the auto schedule setting because I was cold all the time. I called nest and they told me to turn off eco setting. Expensive thermostat and so far I'm only using the programable setting and some mornings it is not at the desired temperature when I get up. Customer service said maybe it's because of the cold weather (high 20s) well I live in northern Michigan. What happens when it's below zero? 
I plan to call customer service again - at one point they said I may need the c- wire installed. If that's the case I will return it - not worth any additional cost - I only have a two wire system. I will update review if things get better
title: Still trying to like it

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: SavvyEGR
content:
I bought two for an invested cost of over $500 online sale from Best Buy Black Friday 2018.

Installed and it worked like a charm for about 6 months. Then it kept disconnecting from WIFI and only able to work manually. Then it quit altogether.

Best Buy total home services simply opened the second I hadn’t opened yet and replaced it three months ago. They couldn’t get it to work either.

Worked ok for three months and when we needed the air to work, it started blowing heat. Followed all the instructions found online and nothing worked. 

Had our heat and ac guy show up today and he checked everything and reinstalled our 15 year old old thermostat and all is fine and working.

Complete waste of money. Bought hoping to save and I can go back to moving the thermostat on my own every day.
title: Complete garbage

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White

content:
This is a good thermostat but it cannot be set correctly if you are looking for more specific settings.

Eg: Turn on fan (for air circulation) from 7.30pm till 10.30 pm. There is no setting for this. You can set it from 7 or from 8 there is no 7.30 (the time I reach home). I dont want to waste electricity running it extra half an hour.

author: Useless
content:
So, buying a smart thermostat is for the convenience of being able to use an app anywhere to control the device.  Unfortunately the app is offline more than it is online.  On tech support they act like it's a new problem, but if you google this problem, it's all over the place.  They cant figure out the problem after many calls and even replacement, just in case it was faulty.  Even tech support for my router couldnt solve the problem.
   Now I have a 150.00 paperweight.
title: Waste of money

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: SoyIsMurder
content:
I replaced two old thermostats in my home with Nest thermostats and I am very happy with them. Being able to adjust the temperature from your phone is amazing. 

I found the schedule programming is a bit time-consuming at first, but once the schedule is in, tweaking time and temperature is easy.

I had an electrician install the first unit, but once I saw how easy it was, I did the second one myself. Make sure you have compatible wiring before moving forward. If you have an old/cheap thermostat you may require some wiring changes (electrician). If you already have the right wires, installation is easy if you're remotely handy.
title: Well Worth the Money

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Basile
content: We tried installing this Nest ourselves as well as hiring a professional (who charged $150!). Utter failure. It's impossible. Nest is very badly designed. It requires so much power. Our cables in the wall simply did not provide enough power. Nest would start up and shut down, repeatedly. Do not buy Nest. Go for ecobee which is much easier, better designed, and less headache to install.
title: Impossible to install, finicky requirements

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: bosco1121
content: Think you want to save money then guess again. Even though this is the 3rd Generation line it still has major flaws. It is costing me OVER $500 to get this installed. even though my a/c unit is only 2 years old they say that the NEST, because it steals power to charge its internal battery, needs another power source. Like the 5 wires in the thermostat aren't enough already. You have to pay for an a/c guy to prove its not your system having issues. Then get him or an electrician to run another wire to power the NEST. Guess again. Save your money! Because the Nest will not ever pay for itself. Not to mention the hours on the phone with their tech support. Poor Poor Poor and a waste of time. Not to mention a bloody hot house in Florida!!!! I will be returning to BB for a refund!
title: Dont waste your money

The Nest thermostat is neat, but it doesn’t work for everyone’s units.

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: DaleyPlanet
content:
Beautiful interface. I love how the display can be programmed to show the current outdoor temperature when approaching it, and then display the expected outdoor temps in the coming hours. This has proven to be a great way to find out about the temperature for the day in the morning and help me decide what clothes to wear!

Connecting to home wifi network was easy. Phone app is great.

I specifically was looking for a thermostat that offered multiple remote temp sensors. The existing thermostat location in our 1980's home leaves something to be desired. It is in a hallway and never does a great job regulating temperatures in the bedrooms it controls. With this thermostat and the complementary remote temp sensors, it should do the trick this winter to keep heat levels comfortable (full disclosure, this was installed this summer and I have yet to see how it performs during the winter. I will update my review if the experience is anything less than stellar).

I still wish the technology were not so expensive. I question the money it will save - but that is secondary to me since the issue with sensing the temperatures in the bedrooms was the problem I needed to solve with this thermostat.
title: Elegant interface, solves therm location issue

I tried to replace an old Honeywell t87f which controlled the A/C and Heating system. (Slave system for zone 2 connected to another master thermostat for zone 1)

The Nest thermostat didn't work with the recommended wiring.

I guess in summer I have to disconnect the heat wire, and connect the A/C wire , not very smart.
title: Doesn't control A/C due to missing C wire

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: vibhutijaya
content:
Upgraded a super-old thermostat and humidistat combo in the new crib with this Nest. First of all, it is beautiful! We paired it with a third party moulding piece that surrounds it fully (a nest for the Nest). It really looks GOOD! We chose copper and the satin finish of the metal is exquisite. Enough about form!
The installation was pretty rocky and it is a story I have to tell for a little caveat emptor affect. We elected to visit the Nest website in order to select a skilled / trained Nest installer. Oh, boy...
The installer chosen was really responsive and sent some employees within the hour (which is amazing!) The guys who arrived proceeded to begin to attempt to install the Nest and it became clear to us that they had absolutely no idea what they were doing. At one point, I think the guys were even flipping through the little Nest manual. The short version of the installation debacle is this: for whatever reason, the guys could not get the Nest to power up and then suddenly (after about a 90 minute trial-and-error session) we were told that all was well. YIKES! A little bit of advice, not all Nest Pros are skilled and experienced in installing this device (despite what the Nest website and supposed Nest credentials might say). 
As far as function is concerned, it's been functioning really well. We're hopeful that we can squeeze a little extra life and efficiency out of our aging HVAC system and keep those bills down. It is really nice to schedule temperature fluctuations and to alter them from the mobile device. I've notice that if I want my place to be comfy and cool for my arrival, I definitely have to give the old system some time to get it cool for me, but that is not so much a condition of Nest as much as it is the limitation of a system that is 12+ years old. We know that when we replace the HVAC in this place, the Nest will be even more useful to us and so far we're happy with the purchase. Fingers crossed that the awkward installation wasn't a botched install. Looking forward to adding cameras and smoke detectors later on. Yay, Nest!
title: Test of the Nest

Despite the set-up the unit works nice and as intended, do check for local incentives. I only gave it a one star review for the misleading claims of you don’t need a C wire.

author: Cass
content: I love my Nest Themostat! Since having it installed (unless you're familiar with your HVAC system, I advise you have it done professionally). I have saved a significant amount of money every last two electric bills. I also love that face that my provider allows for a rebate for purchasing a smart device. Being able to adjust my home's temperature from anywhere has been a life saver, being as though I often forget to turn it off. Two months in I now what to tackle the thermostat's Eco feature. I really advise everyone take the leap!

author: Nique3233

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: onlineshopper
content: I had this for about a week now and it is starting to learn our routines which is pretty cool. I also put both of our phones on it so it doesn't go into eco mode unless we both are gone. This works great since I work first shift and my Wife works 2nd. It doesn't save as much energy due to the smaller window when nobody is home but it is nice to be able to control it off my phone. Make sure you run a common wire from your furnace. I have heard of a lot of problems from people trying to run this off a 4wire system, like the ac kicking on in winter to charge the battery.
title: nest thermostat

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Cjav
content:
I installed this thermostat in May 2020 and initially everything worked very well.  I started noticing significant savings on my utility bills and thought nothing more of it.  Then once the weather started to change the issues started to arise.  The learning feature started moving the temperature all over the place, I would frequently have to go in and program the thermostat back to the schedule that I wanted it on.  In heat/cool mode it would consistently let the temperature idle outside of the range specified.

Then in October the thermostat lost connectivity to my wifi connection and couldn't find any network.  I spent several hours on the phone with Google support until they determined that the nest had suffered a hardware failure.  Now I am waiting on a replacement device.  Considering that the first until only lasted 4.5 months, I am not exactly optimistic about the longevity of this device.  The only reason I didn't give one star is that the unit does save you money.
title: Inconsistent and Poor Quality

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: Skyrider
content:
My AC system doesn't have a C wire, but the nest doesn't require one. However, in this case, it recharges it's battery by tapping into your AC's circuitry. 
As a result, the day after I installed the nest, I had a burning smell coming from my AC system. It turns out my heating system was somehow getting switched on even though the AC would be off. In other words, with the system off and no air circulating, the heating circuitry was on. The repair bill was $250. At first, I thought maybe the Nest was not the culprit. However, a day after the heating relays, wiring and elements were replaced, the burning smell came back. 
I removed the nest thermostat and reinstalled my old thermostat and have not had any issues since.
It's too bad, because I really liked the thermostat with it's wireless smart technology and functions. 
I will look into the ecobee next which comes with a power extender kit for those systems without a C wire.
title: Don't buy if your system doesn't have a C wire

product: Google - Nest Learning Smart Thermostat - 3rd Generation - White
author: AdamS
content:
I spent 6 hours with support trying to get this to work. The first person I spoke to asked what my heating and cooling systems were and I told him, giving him exact model numbers. Then we spent several hours trying to troubleshoot before I got disconnected. After reconnecting I had to start all over again and once again got disconnected a couple hours in. 
The problem is my heating and cooling system are separate. I have an older gas fired forced hot water system. A few years ago I had central AC installed with a blower. Every time I hooked up the Nest my AC kicked on and wouldn't stop. I even tried the C terminal (common) and it still wouldn't work correctly.
Finally the third person I spoke to told me my blower wasn't compatible and it was a known issue. I could've saved 6 hours of my day if the first tech would've told me that. Instead I wasted all that time on a fruitless effort trying to make it work.
My blower is Goodman AVPTCXX14XX. The tech told me they've discovered problems with AVPTC and MBVC blowers. And this is NOT listed in their incompatible systems page which is here: 

https://nest.com/support/article/Incompatible-systems

Double check on nest.com and talk to a chat person before buying this.
title: Incompatible with system and poor support
